summary: After unearthing the lost slasher film from 1978 in Found (2012), the now-grown-up skull-masked boy abducts and tortures helpless women. Now, he needs one more victim. Will her blonde-haired head end up as the Killer's latest trophy?
cast: Shane Beasley|Kelsey Carlisle|Ellie Church|Dave Parker|Kaden Miller|Jennifer Lee|Haley Madison|Brian K. title: Headless
